title: WTB:  Off Back Ball, Becker, Burch, Dahlen, Lundgren, Reulbach
author: JoeRand

posts.post_title: WTB:  Off Back Ball, Becker, Burch, Dahlen, Lundgren, Reulbach
posts.post_content:
Looking for the below T206 with off backs (no Piedmont or Sweet Caps).  Open to graded or raw...  ideally in 1.5 to 3 condition.  Thanks for any help possible!

Ball - fielding
Becker
Burch - batting
Dahlen - boston
Lundgren - chicago
Reulbach - glove
